dalserver
Class SsapKeywordFactory

java.lang.Object
  dalserver.KeywordFactory
      dalserver.SsapKeywordFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable
public class SsapKeywordFactory
extends KeywordFactory

SsapKeywordFactory implements a factory class for well-known SSAP keywords, including Groups, Params and Fields. The use of a factory class frees the client from having to know all the detailed metadata associated with each type of keyword. Keywords are indexed by both their ID and UTYPE tags. In general UTYPE is required to ensure uniqueness, but within a limited scope, the ID tag may be sufficient to uniquely identify a keyword without having to know the full UTYPE.

A list of the major SSAP keywords including the defined ID and UTYPE keys is shown in this table. All non-data keywords from the full Spectrum data model are also available, but only those most commonly used in the SSAP query response are shown by default in the SSAP keyword dictionary and code. For each group (component data model), the ID, UTYPE, and DESCRIPTION fields for the GROUP element are given first, followed by the parameters belonging to that group. The datatype and unit are also specified for parameter elements.

Constructor Detail

SsapKeywordFactory

public SsapKeywordFactory()
Null constructor to generate a new SSAP keyword factory.

SsapKeywordFactory

public SsapKeywordFactory(RequestResponse response)
                   throws DalServerException
Create a new SSAP keyword factory and initialize an associated request response to process SSAP keywords. This is not required, but allows automated initialization of related context such as the keyword name space.

Parameters:
response - RequestResponse object to be linked to the SSAP keyword factory.
Throws:
DalServerException
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
SSAP keyword-related utilities. 
   ingest [csv-file]    Turn a CSV version of the SSAP data model
                                into a SsapData class which contains raw data
                                defining the data model.

   doc [type]           Generate an HTML version of the SSAP keyword
                                dictionary.

   table [type]         Generate Java code to create the indicated
                                keywords in a RequestResponse object.
